DOC.criteria: Have diagnosis bilateral ocular hypertension early primary open angle glaucoma Have best correct visual acuity eye least +0.5 well Have normal endothelial cell count morphology Are diagnose closed angle glaucoma , exfoliation syndrome exfoliation glaucoma , pigment dispersion secondary glaucoma Have history type intraocular surgery , except cataract surgery Have cataract surgery within three month
